products.name: m80
products.description: A fan favorite, mainly among kids, be careful when lighting because you could lose a finger or worse.

products.name: cherry bomb
products.description: Another popular product, smaller than the m80 but everybit as loud.

products.name: Roman candle
products.description: Shoots several fireballs at different intervals while increasing in range.

products.name: Excalibur
products.description: Launches mortar shells into the air that burst into colorful plumes, each round has a different effect.

products.name: Chrysanthemum
products.description: Mortar fireworks that explode into bright vibrant colors.

products.name: Dahlia
products.description: Standard artillery fireworks that explode with red, white, and blue plumes.

products.name: Sparklers
products.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

products.name: Black cat Citrus
products.description: This fireworks ignites and immediately showers the sky and ground with sparks and much more.

products.name: Fire Cracker
products.description: You light, you throw, you smile.

products.name: Napalm
products.description: Made by using a gelling agent with petrol to create a very sticky and flamable product that will melt bricks.

products.name: Moltov Cocktail
products.description: A crude incendiary device that involves a bottle filled with a flamable liquid with a raq or related source to ignite.

products.name: Thermite
products.description: An easy to make product that is hot enough to burn through steel.

products.name: Dynamite
products.description: Used in every common demolition job across the world, the product of turning nitro glycerin into an explosive liquid.

products.name: C4
products.description: Common variety of plastic explosive composed of explosives, plastic binder and a plasticizer to make it malleable.

products.name: Semetex
products.description: A general purpose plastic explosive containing RDX and PETN, used in comercial blasting and demolition.

products.name: Land Mine
products.description: An explosive device concealed under the ground designed to eliminate hostile targets or vehicles.

products.name: Claymore
products.description: Unlike the land mine a claymore is detonated by remote control and fires several metal balls into its line of fire like a shot gun.

products.name: Trip Wire
products.description: A passive triggering mechanism that is attached to a device for detecting or reacting to movement.
